      default void ContextualEgoNetworkListener.onCreateNode(Node node)
      Called when a new node is created by the ContextualEgoNetwork.getOrCreateNode(String, Object) method (after the created node is added to the network).
      default void ContextualEgoNetworkListener.onRemoveNode(Context context, Node node)
      Called when a node is removed from a context using the Context.removeNode(Node).
      default void ContextualEgoNetworkListener.onRemoveNode(Node node)
      Called when a node is removed from the contextual ego network by the ContextualEgoNetwork.removeNodeIfExists(String) method.

      Removes an edge between a source and a destination node.
      void Context.removeNode(Node node)
      Removes a node and its edges from the context
